description: This file defines a Lightning.js component named 'Home' using the Blits library. It contains a template for rendering UI elements such as a logo, loader, text, and a button. It also manages component state, animation hooks, and a method to rotate loader colors.

classes.name: Home
classes.description: A Lightning.js component that renders a homepage with animated logo, loader, text, and button, managing state transitions and color rotations.

methods.name: rotateColors
methods.description: Cycles through a predefined list of colors at a given interval to change the loader's color.
